home.title: Home
home.welcome_message: Let's see the world through linguistic and cultural perspectives!
home.course_description: Reading thousands of books is not as good as traveling thousands of miles. Let us help you experience it in practice! Culture is the beginning of encountering differences. Language will be the key to unlocking conversations. Travel is the path to experience everything. Thematic learning helps you prepare for common scenarios during travel. Prepare your language knowledge and practice how to think and respond through interactive exercises.
home.theme_class_description:
Practical Thematic Conversation Class: Led by Japanese teachers, enjoy the joy of conversation and interaction through extensive listening and speaking practice in real-life situations! 
- Basic Grammar Foundation Class: Start from the basics to understand Japanese language knowledge and grammar structure, with solid training in listening, speaking, reading, and writing so you can speak out and enjoy the intricacies of reading and writing. 
- Multilingual Cafe: Regular online and in-person exchange activities where you can experience diverse input and output practices through interaction with foreign teachers, native speakers, and language learners. 
 Whether you're a beginner or have some foundation, we can help you enhance your Japanese skills in a relaxed and enjoyable environment, letting you enjoy the learning process and experience the joy of Japanese communication.

autumn_course.title: Autumn Japanese Course Enrollment
autumn_course.summary: We are pleased to announce that enrollment for the 2024 Autumn Japanese course is now open. The course is designed to break away from traditional vocabulary and grammar-focused learning. It features thematic situational learning, where students practice dialogues and vocabulary relevant to various real-life situations. This season's course will focus on Japanese culture and business Japanese, helping students use Japanese more effectively in both work and life.

bilingual_cafe_july.title: [ Bilingual Cafe ] @ Hualien City - July
bilingual_cafe_july.summary: Join our monthly in-person Bilingual Cafe meeting! This time, it's scheduled for 7/6 (Sat) 19:30~. We have participants speaking English, Chinese, and Japanese. Come introduce yourself and enjoy this fantastic event in Hualien!

bilingual_cafe_may.title: [ Bilingual Cafe ] @ Hualien City - May
bilingual_cafe_may.summary: Join our monthly in-person Bilingual Cafe meeting! This time, it's scheduled for 6/1 (Sat) 19:30~. We have participants speaking English, Chinese, and Japanese. Come introduce yourself and enjoy this fantastic event in Hualien!

mini_japanese_class.title: Mini Japanese Conversation Class Enrollment
mini_japanese_class.summary: This class avoids starting with 'aiueo' and instead uses 'thematic conversation' to prevent students from feeling discouraged by the challenges of memorizing kana. This approach aims to inspire enjoyment in learning and speaking Japanese.
